short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Night Search new tab page with weather widget and dark wallpapers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Night Search helps people who care about their new tab search experience. Say goodbye to the boring, white, and uninspiring new tab page.

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Night Search extension and setting Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your Chrome New Tab search engine to Microsoft Bing.

Terms of Use: https://nightsearch.org/eula.html
Privacy Policy: https://nightsearch.org/privacy.html
Contact us: https://nightsearch.org/about.html

Night Search allows you to use one of our pre-installed backgrounds and customizable widgets.

At the heart of Night Search lies our commitment to providing the most accurate search results in a sleek, dark color scheme. Whether you're looking for information, inspiration, or entertainment, our search engine delivers the results you need in style.

With Night Search browser extension You will receive an accurate weather widget and other useful information.

You have the flexibility to manually disable any of our features: time, date, weather, search bar, quick links, wallpaper.

Upgrade your New Tab page with Night Search today!
